website_summaries.verdict: A good pick if you want a low-cost set, but competitor sets may offer slightly quieter performance for some drivers.
pros: A lot to offer for a reasonable price – good bite, consistently smooth stops during pad life, and low brake dust build-up
They are also easy to install
cons: Squeaks noted on some vehicles and in some driving conditions, but may fade after break-in period
Instructions that come with them are lacking details

customer_reviews.title: Cheap brakes, only 1 wear indicator clip, Squeak when not pressing brake
customer_reviews.text: Cheap brake pads. Only one wear indicator, not the biggest problem since brakes on each side should wear out more or less at the same time. The big problem is the brake squeak when I release my foot off the brake. My rotors are brand new and these are installed on them. The large metal flakes in this cheap brake material is squeaking up a storm. I guess there is a reason why the genuine Subaru pads are twice the price of this set.
customer_reviews.author: Ted K.

customer_reviews.title: Complete trash
customer_reviews.text: As soon as they were installed these squeaked badly. After about 150 miles it continued and even worsened. The brakes even make audible noises when applying and letting go of the brake at a complete stop. It's complete trash and I regret cheaping out with this purchase. I don't plan to buy Wagners ever again!
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Very good pads but LOUD
customer_reviews.text: These pads perform great and are extremely low dust but man... they are LOUD. They were quiet for about 15 minutes but immediately started squeaking. I've been counting down to when I need to replace these to get something quieter. Again, the performance is great, but they squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Danfzzl

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just been a week since installed, no complaints so far. Came with lubricant. Quiet and brakes well. Brakes are so easy to install, I don't get why people will pay $200+ per axle when they can get OE quality brakes like this from Amazon and do it themselves. Will update my review if anything bad happens.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still alive
customer_reviews.text: I put these brakes on a few months ago, and they must be good because I haven't died yet! Yes ladies and gentlemen, you too can have a smooth ride with no brake screeching all while saving your money and staying alive! I'm not saying you will die if you don't use these brakes, but I'm saying it isn't worth the risk. Take it from a legitimate air breather.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wolfaardt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, cheap product. I strongly do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price, cheap product. The hardware is made of lighter gauge metal; bends too easily and fits poorly. Does not contain as many shims as the original 3-shim brake pads. Only one of the pads contained a sound/scream reid, where two are required. I strongly do not recommend this product. I would give this zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: cristyn

customer_reviews.title: Good fit but smaller contact area.  2013 Outback
customer_reviews.text: Okay replacement pads. Good fit on my 2013 Outback, BUT, the brake pad friction material is about an eighth of an inch smaller around the edges on all sides than the stock pads so there are less square inches of contact with the rotor. They perform just fine but I expect them to wear out faster than the original pads because of this.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I had a friend mechanic install them and they have kept me safe! They don't feel much different than my original breaks. I can't tell if they are a bit slower to stop or not.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great price, proper fit. I decided to do the front brakes at the last minute and bought the pads at a local auto store - OUCH $$$
customer_reviews.author: Tom or Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Wagner brake pads and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice brake pads for my 2008 Subaru Outback. Package included new clips and grease. Perfect fit and quick change to get the Subaru stopping like new again...
customer_reviews.author: David Trebacz

customer_reviews.title: I found the instructions very poor. Nice pads though
customer_reviews.text: I was told that all the pads are the same by Wagner support. You can see that they're not. The one tabbed pad goes on passenger rear. The grease goes on the back of the pads on the shims. The instructions don't say that. In fact, I found the instructions very poor. Nice pads though.
customer_reviews.author: amazed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 2014 Subaru Crosstrek.
customer_reviews.text: No extra filing of tabs necessary. Comes with right amount of Moly lube. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: stinkdyr

customer_reviews.title: Missing tell tales
customer_reviews.text: I got a single pad with a tell tale. Need to be more careful packaging these. They work just fine and seem to be good pads, but didn't get what should have been in the package.
customer_reviews.author: nowayjose

customer_reviews.title: Wear Fast in Dirty/Muddy Environs
customer_reviews.text: These pad work well enough but wear extremely quickly in mud/dirt environments.
customer_reviews.author: B. Westervelt

customer_reviews.title: On time and works great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered both front and rear brake pads. Installation went smoothly with no problem. The brakes are working smoothly and there is no noise after driving around. The package came with a small packet of brake pad lubrication that was not enough for lubricating both driver side AND passenger side, but since we had some on hand it was not a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Dusty, but good.
customer_reviews.text: They stop. They're dirty. Not as bad as some, but they aren't the cleanest. I haven't had them fade yet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Wagner QuickStop ZD1114 Ceramic Disc Pad Set Includes Pad Installation Hardware, Rear
customer_reviews.text: Used on 2010 Subaru Forester. Good stopping power, no noise and next-to no dust build-up. (Reused stock shims and added a little brake pad lube.)
customer_reviews.author: C Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Product review.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Wagner has always supplied great brakes. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brakes
customer_reviews.text: Love Wagner brakes. Been buying them for years. Wouldn't switch to another brand if they gave them for free.
customer_reviews.author: chusta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, better product. Half the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. automatic improvement soon after install i could feel the difference. Coated so it won't rust and the shims fit perfectly. plus this product was half the price at the nearby auto shops. and that was for the regular organic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Fit well on 2014 Forester 2. 5i ( base ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well on 2014 Forester 2.5i ( base , non turbo model ) Rear Brake Pads both side ( 4 pads ) stop well. No sqweek, or noise. Forester caliper can take little bit more thicker pads.
customer_reviews.author: Agness

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stop good no fade good bite low dust used Wagner in the past n these don't disappoint. Great pads
customer_reviews.author: walter goring

customer_reviews.title: Brakes well, but not quietly.
customer_reviews.text: Decent value. went on easy enough but getting a decent amount of squeaking on an otherwise smooth rotor.
customer_reviews.author: ACDRS

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: All of the hardware fit well on my 2012 forester, solid stopping, no squeak! Easy installation, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish very good, worked great on 2012 Forester. Stops a little better than OEM, quiet
customer_reviews.author: mike884

customer_reviews.title: do not combine with order that is not the same as original vehile
customer_reviews.text: I had to modify them, as they were not for my vehicle. Need to upgrade you site so parts are correct.
customer_reviews.author: Roger R. Stoflet

customer_reviews.title: Stop and smell the roses.
customer_reviews.text: Quite and smooth for those normal stops. Also works great on an unexpected stopping need. Cops hate that I can stop now.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Product that works well!
customer_reviews.text: Brake pads were easy to install, way cheaper and works like the OEM.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: must be fitted
customer_reviews.text: Some fitting was required the metal tab ends had to be filed a little.
customer_reviews.author: EDR

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice that the kit includes the carriers. Car stops. Posed no undue problems upon installation.
customer_reviews.author: glntk

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2011 Subaru Outback 2.5 limited great and, so far, none of the irritating noise that normally comes with cheap brake pads.
customer_reviews.author: William VanDevender

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy installation and they appear to be of high quality. Don't know about wear yet but I have high expectations for Wagner products
customer_reviews.author: It is a wonderful day!

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a DIY guy not trying to get ripped off by a mechanic. No fitment issues for a 2014 Subaru Legacy.
customer_reviews.author: Kody soares

customer_reviews.title: Working great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far, have had them for a couple months on my Subaru Outback 2011.
customer_reviews.author: Mikiya

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: Product was timely and high quality. It only took me approximately 40 minutes with basic tools to change the brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too late to return! Only 1 pad wore excess wear metal tab
customer_reviews.author: MIKE HAS

customer_reviews.title: Sent me three outer pads...
customer_reviews.text: Pads fit well and seem to be decent quality for the price. I deducted two stars because they gave me three outer pads and only one inner one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will fit 2009 Subaru Forester rear brakes  . Five star would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These rear brake shoes or for my 2009 Subaru Forrester. Seem to be well-made would recommend. Five star. We’re delivered quickly and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Dadoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Best aftermarket brakes out there!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Comes with complete hardware for Lexus RX350 and other vehicles! Brakes produce less dust compared to any other aftermarket brake I've ever used! I will definitely use the Weaver products in the future for all of my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Only one inboard pad had the end of life warning ...
customer_reviews.text: Only one inboard pad had the end of life warning piece. Was in the middle of the break job when I noticed so they went on as is..
customer_reviews.author: JohnyD56

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great fit and great performance...nice and quiet too
customer_reviews.author: Mort

customer_reviews.title: I want to exchange
customer_reviews.text: These brake pads are very bad, they produce lot a dust and keeps the car rims filthy all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dionis Alcantara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ON TIME RIGHT FIT GREAT PRICE WHAT MORE DO YOU WANT THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Includes the metal clips that I would had to have paid extra at local auto parts store.
customer_reviews.author: FunFinder

customer_reviews.title: Easy quality parts
customer_reviews.text: High quality brake pads, easy to install, comes with all hardware
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Did not dit the car and they verified it would
customer_reviews.author: corey manuell

customer_reviews.title: ... is up with all these people claiming these pads suck and/or squeak like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is up with all these people claiming these pads suck and/or squeak like crazy. I installed the fronts and rears on my 2011 WRX last week and they work great. I have a lot of experience autocrossing so tend to know my way around brake pads. These bite immediately and have 0 problem locking up my tires. I wouldn't use them for racing (ceramics don't have the best heat dispersion) but for daily driving they are perfect. There is no squeaking. I've only driven a couple hundred miles on them so will update this review if things change.
customer_reviews.author: mrkyle

customer_reviews.title: ... ones and did not fit I was not very happy about that everything else was fine though
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both front and rear brakes for my Subaru the front brakes came and fit perfectly however the back brakes were the wrong ones and did not fit I was not very happy about that everything else was fine though
customer_reviews.author: D.P. Pak Juice.

customer_reviews.title: Bad set.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my 2014 Crosstrek. It's time using Wagner. Easy to install but i drove it made scraping noises with out applying the brakes. I bought new pads from a local shop and worked fine. I was the lucky one to get a bad set.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chen

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I was quoted $400, so I saved about $380 by doing it myself. It took me about 15 minutes per side.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Wagner brakes are a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Working fine on 2016 suburb forester,good feel to stoping ability
customer_reviews.author: lawrence grant

product_meta.title: Wagner QuickStop ZD1114 Ceramic Disc Pad Set Includes Pad Installation Hardware, Rear
product_meta.description: Wagner QuickStop ceramic brake pads are designed, tested and certified to ensure a vehicle’s braking system will be restored to original equipment performance.
feature_bullets: RESTORES LIKE-NEW BRAKING PERFORMANCE -- OE fit and form design delivers consistent, even braking throughout the life of the brake pad
REDUCED VIBRATION -- Application-specific design reduces noise-causing vibration
EVEN PERFORMANCE -- Engineered for consistent braking throughout the life of the pad
APPLICATION-SPECIFIC MATERIALS – Formulated to meet the unique needs of each vehicle application
HARDWARE INCLUDED – Premium stainless-steel hardware and OE-style lubricant included in most applications
COMPREHENSIVE COVERAGE -- Brake pads available for all vehicle types

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars202 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
